_header: Vital was a noble mon in the land of Rome
Subjects: Vital, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Vital in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Vital was a noble man in þe lond of rome& hadde many bonde
                    men þat of him lond nome…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…ffor þus vital & agricola
                    ðere lyuus hy gonen endenouȝ
                    Ihesu for here veyre loue graunte vs to heuen wende
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 351-3.
